{{{class="brush:c++"
	// random r: r >= min and r <= max

	FMath::RandRange(float min, float max);

* clamp
{{{class="brush:c++"
	// if value < min then value = min
	// if value > max then value = max
	FMath::Clamp(float value, float min, float max);      
}}}
